        Replaces supplementary characters with a ? character
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:

      • upcase

        public static java.lang.String upcase(java.lang.String string)
        Transforms the given string into upper case, adding underscores between words. Examples:
        • upcase(null) == null
        • upcase("") == ""
        • upcase("myName") == "MY_NAME"
        • upcase("MyName") == "MY_NAME"
        • upcase("MyNAME") == "MY_N_A_M_E"
